839320.name: Fantasy Grounds - Chibi Characters Vol 1 (Token Pack)
839320.description:
Chibi Characters Vol 1

Make your game more monstrously fun with Monster Grin's 55 unique new chibi tokens, each usable as PCs, NPCs, mooks, monsters, or bosses!
Delightfully anime styled chibi humans, elves, aasimar, and more are all contained in this pack and will add a whole new element of hilarity and fun to your game.
Utilize Monster Grin's Token Halo System to create different types of teams (red, gold, green, or blue), or even different levels of the same kind of creature (i.e. boss, high, medium, or low level) to help keep track of whats what and whos who and keep your game rockin'!
This token pack includes (ringed in silver, black, blue, gold, green, greyscale, full body, and silver):
  • Aasimar Mage
  • Human Cleric
  • Human Druid
  • Ettercap Barbarian
  • Human Barbarian
  • Human Paladin
  • Tiefling Fighter
Conversion by: James Holloway
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
